mapper.select: select date_format(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d') as date, sum(totalPrice-totalSuperiorPrice) as inCome from GoodsOrder where date_format(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d') < #{lastMinDate} group by date order by date desc limit 20

select yearweek(date_format(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d'),1) as week, sum(totalPrice-totalSuperiorPrice) as inCome from GoodsOrder where yearweek(date_format(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d'),1) < #{lastMinWeek} group by week order by week desc limit 20

select date_format(createTime,'%Y-%m') as month, sum(totalPrice-totalSuperiorPrice) as inCome from GoodsOrder where date_format(createTime,'%Y-%m') < #{lastMinMonth} group by month order by month desc limit 20
